category.category: Compounds used in a research, industrial, or household setting

drug-interaction.name: Dimercaprol
drug-interaction.description: Dimercaprol may increase the nephrotoxic activities of Ferumoxsil.

drug-interaction.name: Cefdinir
drug-interaction.description: Ferumoxsil can cause a decrease in the absorption of Cefdinir resulting in a reduced serum concentration and potentially a decrease in efficacy.

drug-interaction.name: Deferiprone
drug-interaction.description: The serum concentration of Deferiprone can be decreased when it is combined with Ferumoxsil.

drug-interaction.description: Ferumoxsil can cause a decrease in the absorption of Dolutegravir resulting in a reduced serum concentration and potentially a decrease in efficacy.

drug-interaction.name: Levodopa
drug-interaction.description: The bioavailability of Levodopa can be decreased when combined with Ferumoxsil.
